text:
Kate Hudson dazzled in a revealing nude colored gown for the Golden Globe Awards.
The 36-year-old actress flaunted her gym-toned abs in the shimmering Michael Kors dress, which featured a large cut out mid-section and choker detail.
The stunning light hued number had a polka dot pattern, giving her overall look a sparkling touch.
